content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for coming to see my apartment, Mr. Li. I am interested in hearing your offer for the rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am currently renting an apartment in Munich and I am looking for a new one. I would like to know if you are willing to negotiate on the rental price. If so, please let me know.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I am open to negotiating on the rental price, Mr. Li. What is your current rental price and what are you looking for in terms of a rental price for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am currently renting for 1000 Euros per month. I am looking for a rental price of 900 Euros per month for this apartment.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I am sorry, Mr. Li, but I am not willing to accept a rental price of 900 Euros per month for this apartment. I believe that the current rental market in Munich warrants a higher price for this apartment. I am open to discussing a rental price that is mutually beneficial and reflects the current market value of the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
